scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run dev:backend" "pnpm run dev:frontend" "pnpm run dev:blog"
scripts.build: concurrently "pnpm run build:scripts" "pnpm run build:backend" "pnpm run build:frontend" "pnpm run build:blog"
scripts.deploy:backend: pnpm run build:backend && pnpm run -C packages/backend deploy
scripts.deploy:frontend: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run -C packages/frontend deploy
scripts.deploy:blog: pnpm run build:blog && pnpm run -C packages/blog deploy
scripts.deploy: pnpm run migrate:prod && concurrently "pnpm run deploy:backend" "pnpm run deploy:frontend" "pnpm run deploy:blog"
scripts.migrate:prod: pnpm run -C packages/backend prisma:migrate:prod && pnpm run -C packages/backend prisma:generate:prod
